export default(function(){var intervals=[];// eslint-disable-next-line no-restricted-globals
self.onmessage=function(message){if(!message)return;var data=message.data;switch(data.type){case'CREATE_INTERVAL':{var id=data.timerId;var time=data.time;var response=data.response;var interval=setInterval(function(){return postMessage(response);},time);intervals.push({id:id,interval:interval});return;}case'REMOVE_INTERVAL':{var _id=data.timerId;var i=0;while(i<intervals.length){var _interval=intervals[i];if(_interval.id===_id){clearInterval(_interval.interval);intervals.splice(i,1);return;}}}}};});
